content.text:
# Hindu High School, Karwar

Hindu High School, situated in the heart of karwar, is one of the oldest schools in Uttara Kannada district, Karnataka, India. It was founded by Vaman Mangesh Dubhashi.
The school was established in 1897. The school has both English and Kannada medium.
Hindu High School has an NCC unit which is part of 8(Kar) Naval Unit NCC, Karwar.
Former headmasters
* P. S. Bandekar
* N. T. Devadig
* M. B. Naik
* A. D. Kulkarni
* V. S. Shet
* S. D. Bhende
* A. K. Rao
* R. S. Hedge
* P. G. Naik
* Nehan Abdulla
